resources.string: Sync %s on all of your devices.
I have read and agree to the Terms and Conditions and the Privacy Policy.
When there has been no recent activity, the music will be paused to save battery power. To continue listening, tap OK.
The music has been paused to save battery power. Tap here to continue listening.
Unable to remove from Favourite tracks.
The maximum number of stations (%d) has been reached. Remove a station from My stations.
To customise your stations, add tracks you like to your Favourite tracks.
The maximum number of favourite tracks (%d) has been reached. Your oldest favourite track will be removed.
After you listen to your tracks, they will be shown here.
Personalise the dial with your favourite genres.
Customise your station by adding artists or tracks.
Your customised station will be deleted.
Unable to remove from My stations.
Unable to add to My Stations.
This station is no longer available.
Choose which %d genres you would like to appear on the station dial
The maximum number of genres (%d) has been reached. Remove a genre from the station dial.
The station name %s is already in use. Choose a different name.
Create a new station or add a station from the dial to customise your station list.
A station description is not currently available.
Server error occurred. Try again later.
There is no network connection currently available. Check your network settings and try again.
Network connection error. Unable to play station.
Application already in use. Only 1 device can stream at a time.
Only 1 device can stream at a time. Try again in 10 minutes.
This application is not available in your country or location.
Your account has been removed. %s will be closed.
You have been signed out. Please sign in to access your History, Favorites and My Stations.
The service is busy. Try again in %d minutes.
Failed to sign in. Try again later.
Allow application to use my location
You must be at least %d years old to enable explicit content.
You must be at least %d years old to enable explicit content. Sign in to verify your age.
Connecting via mobile networks may result in additional charges depending on your payment plan.
A custom station will be created.
This station has been added to My stations. It will only be available for a limited time.
Tap the screen to show the dial.
Add your favourite artists or tracks.
The maximum number of seeds (%d) has been reached. This seed has not been added.
Sign in to store your History, Favourite tracks and My Stations.
In order to find the cause of the error, an error log containing your device information and application usage history will be sent. This error log will be deleted once the error has been remedied.
Tap the screen to show the station dial.
Tap the menu icon on the left side of the screen and select Customise my stations to change your view, remove stations, view station details, and edit station seeds.
Tap the menu icon on the left side of the screen and select Customise dial to choose the genres you want to be displayed on the station dial.
A Wi-Fi network is not available. Connecting to mobile networks may result in additional charges depending on your payment plan.
%1$s has been disabled. Go to Settings and enable %2$s.
Tap or swipe the screen to open the menu
Tap a station name to view the full list
You need to download and install %s. You will be taken to the app download screen.
A new version is available. An update is required to continue.
A new version is available. Update the application to continue.
Session expired for the test user. Please get the latest version and try again.
Add %s to your dial and try again.
Do you send reports to Server when Error is occured?
This station cannot be fine tuned.
Slide right for more hits or left for more fringe music.
Slide right for newer music or left for older music.
Slide right for more favourite tracks or left for less.
Swipe across the screen to unlock your device.
Application only available for Samsung devices.
An update is required to access Samsung services. Tap notification panel to download the update.
